tooltip.relics.acid_walker.description: Allows its owner to safely traverse acidic surfaces, neutralizing harmful effects and providing protection. Grants access to explore radiation hazard zones, making the insurmountable surmountable.
tooltip.relics.acid_walker.ability.walki: For a certain period, allows movement across acid surfaces without sinking into them or sustaining corrosion. After the duration ends, it begins to leave behind a toxic trail, applying acid effects to all living beings.
tooltip.relics.polar_boot.description: Provides the wearer with the ability to levitate above the surface, making it easier to traverse difficult terrain and push the boundaries of exploration.
tooltip.relics.polar_boot.ability.polari: Switches the polarity of the boot between blue and red. Red increases the force of attraction to the ground, while blue allows you to levitate freely above its surface.
tooltip.relics.desolate_pendant.descript: Wields ghostly knives, stealthily piercing targets in the path of its wearer.
Each attack the wearer makes with a certain chance summons a phantom blade, dealing a fraction of the original damage to the target.
Invokes several phantom blades, alternately dealing the target a fraction of the weapon's damage from the hand.
tooltip.relics.vine_ring.description: Spawns thickets of archaic vines, opening new avenues for exploring the complex landscapes of underground territories.
tooltip.relics.vine_ring.ability.vine.de: Generates a vertical vine from the player's current position to the nearest solid block on the ceiling.
